title: Spokanistan51
author: Spokanistan51
content: I ran across this recently, and wanted to share as I know there are a lot of various BTC card collectors on here.In 2022, the Bitcoin themed SBF "Treasure Hunter" Topps Garbage Pail Kids card was released. The #6 card shows Bitcoins being clay pigeon style blasted from the air by SBF himself. Some have even entered I am no expert, but a few interesting items to note:1) It appears 1265 were made 2) There is a unhappy face border parallel version (example below, not mine). I'm not sure if these are included in the 1265 production run, or a limited number of these were produced on top of the 1265 white borders.Being a limited production run, these look to be a nice collector item and I wanted to share. Ebay has them pretty cheap to snatch one or more up!https://www.ebay.com/itm/394477508851?hash=item5bd8b118f3:g:0GgAAOSwzKxj9s0k&amdata=enc%3AAQAIAAAA0EoTMd2%2FG%2F%2BmZpvGczdMhWKfq9XXGBptRxu1uWSZexCzSkGcS4A3ayhPITJu4kLQuM9YgZTWbqjHhCcRxG7Ui82vymGilUH8XHWMcsK%2BtHTKPU6%2BpvRgwtTBv3ckBea72TBtZmzjKL2WdnAFjMoLzhg1nKCniVmqilEexoYoGgI9bldvQcJiWC6t2s5SRK5l%2FmHNdiq5yOQhsQRx741XW1Je48TBrGWCrpfvbhIvNDWKVET2Xq1%2B2bSpjXjDIbQa4z%2BBdDczA61CmW9TyGcHzkg%3D%7Ctkp%3ABk9SR8j_rI-PYg

comments.author: tweetious
comments.body: you can also check "NFT Tim" & "Crypto Chris" from GPK COMPLEXLAND 1st Series

comments.body: Those look to be rare birds!Quote from: tweetious on June 01, 2023, 10:16:13 PMyou can also check "NFT Tim" & "Crypto Chris" from GPK COMPLEXLAND 1st Series

comments.author: montreal1
comments.created_time: June 01, 2023, 11:18:20 PMLast edit: June 01, 2023, 11:37:57 PM by montreal1
comments.body: thank you for sharing  just picked a few up

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.created_time: June 02, 2023, 03:58:27 PMLast edit: June 02, 2023, 05:08:37 PM by OgNasty
comments.body: Thank you for sharing.  I remember when Garbage Pail Kids were all the rage back in the day.  They were banned from school and were like forbidden treasures to possess at a young age.  A kid down the street from me used to have a whole binder full of them and we would all look at them in amazement that he was allowed to own them.  I went ahead and grabbed one ($15 shipped from eBay), mostly for sentimental reasons I guess.  I hate collecting stuff like this because it always ends up sitting in a safe and being forgotten about, but I figure this one might be worth having in the collection.  I should've grabbed the Pez dispenser too.Edit: Screw it, I grabbed the pez dispenser too. I guess I’m collecting this type of stuff now.

I guess I’m collecting this type of stuff now.   This made me laugh. Been there, or rather, I'm perpetually there.

I guess I’m collecting this type of stuff now. Garbage pall kids was even a fad here in Aus when I was a kid, probably late 80,s or early 90's Wish I knew what happened to those cards I had

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: I have one of these cards - mainly because it does have Bitcoin on it.
